product.name: 380 LB Capacity Folding Hand Truck Heavy Duty Foldable Dolly Cart with Wheels, Aluminum Collapsible Hand Cart Portable Trolley Dolley with Telescoping Handle for Moving Use Gorpuire
product.description: When moving goods, hold the items with one hand and the handrail with the other until the cart tilts. This reduces strain on your body and helps extend the cart's lifespan.
product.bullet_points:
• Heavy Duty Load Capacity for Effortless Moving: Gorpuire folding hand truck is made from high-strength steel tubes and a durable aluminum alloy base, with a maximum weight capacity of 380 lbs. Whether you're moving heavy furniture, appliances, or large boxes, it can easily handle the job. Its strong and durable construction ensures safe use in various environments such as at home, in the office, or in a warehouse, making it the perfect moving assistant for all your heavy lifting tasks
• Compact Folding Design for Easy Storage: Gorpuire foldable dolly cart folds down to just 2 inches thick, making it incredibly space-efficient for storage. Whether placed in your car trunk or garage, it can be stored easily, making it an ideal solution for limited space. Even in small apartments or spaces with tight storage, you can always have a durable moving tool on hand
• Smooth Maneuvering on Various Surfaces: Equipped with 7-inch upgraded rubber wheels, this moving dolly glides smoothly on sidewalks, uneven pavement, and indoor spaces, making moving easier. The included elastic rope further enhances stability during use, providing a quiet and smooth operation for a comfortable experience
• Adjustable Swivel Handle for Comfort and Flexibility: The extendable handle can be adjusted up to 45 inches, making it suitable for users of various heights. The handle is wrapped in soft rubber foam for added comfort, ensuring a better grip. Additionally, two swivel grips underneath the handle allow for flexible adjustments, making it easier to handle a variety of moving tasks
• Ready to Use, Convenient and Effortless: This foldable hand truck requires no assembly—just unfold it and adjust the handle to get started. Weighing only 12.3 lbs, this 2 wheel dolly is easy to operate, allowing you to begin your moving tasks quickly and effortlessly, saving both time and energy
• Expert Tips & Worry-Free After-Sales Service: When moving goods, hold the items with one hand and the handrail with the other until the portable dolly tilts. This reduces strain on your body and helps extend the cart's lifespan. If you experience any quality issues within 365 days, please reach out to us promptly. We will ensure you receive satisfactory service
